name: Flow - DEMO
description:
Please note that this is an early demonstration version of the game and is intended to showcase the feeling and universe of the game.

What's this ?

Flow is a First Person Shooter Rythm Game made by a team of 5 students as an Epic Game Jam project.

How to Play ?

Download the game with the Itch.io app !

  • QZDS : Move
  • Left Mouse : First Ability
  • Right Mouse : Second Ability
  • Middle Mouse/E : Third Ability
  • Space Bar : Jump

I like it. Where's the full game ?

Check Man Cave Service's page, a poll should be up to vote for which game the developper will work on and publish first.

Assets :

  • Zombie models and zombie animations from Mixamo.

Music :

  • Terminite & Panda Eyes - Highscore
